output.name: GlassLensWatch
output.description: GlassLensWatch is an independent, nonprofit newsroom dedicated to producing investigative journalism in the public interest. With a team of over 100 passionate journalists, GlassLensWatch focuses on impactful storytelling that aims to drive real-world change. The organization prides itself on its commitment to diversity and inclusion within the newsroom, ensuring that its reporting reflects the communities it serves.
